text: Joe Maddon (born 1954) is the manager of the Los Angeles Angels in Major League Baseball. From 2015 until 2019 Maddon was the manager of the Chicago Cubs. He led the Cubs to a World Series victory in 2016. He previously managed the Tampa Bay Rays. ==References== ==Other websites== *Joe Maddon entry at Baseball reference Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Chicago Cubs managers Category:Tampa Bay Rays Category:Major League Baseball managers Category:Los Angeles Angels
title: Joe Maddon
